perturbation.original_text: This Schedule (“Schedule”) is made as of the effective date set forth above to that Software License, Customization, and Maintenance Agreement, by and between Cardlytics, Inc. (“Supplier”) and Bank of America, N. A, (“Bank of America”), dated November 5, 2010, as amended (“SLCMA”). Each capitalized term used but not defined herein shall have the meaning assigned in the SLCMA.
perturbation.changed_text: This Schedule (“Schedule”) is made as of the effective date set forth above to that Software License, Customization, and Maintenance Agreement, by and between Cardlytics, Inc. (“Supplier”) and Bank of America, N. A, (“Bank of America”), dated November 5, 2010, as amended (“SLCMA”). Each capitalized term used but not fully defined herein shall follow common business practices.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that all capitalized terms not defined in the Schedule have the meaning assigned in the SLCMA. The modified text removes the connection and references only common business practices, potentially contradicting specific definitions within the SLCMA and making those definitions unenforceable under this schedule.

perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS, Bank of America and Supplier entered into the SLCMA in order to set forth the terms and conditions pursuant to which Supplier provides certain Software to Bank of America, WHEREAS, the parties desire to add to the SLCMA the Supplier Offer Placement System Software
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, Bank of America and Supplier desire to collaborate on software solutions, WHEREAS, the parties intend to pilot new software offerings
perturbation.explanation: By removing the direct reference to the SLCMA and the specific software agreement, the changed text makes the purpose of the agreement vague. This now contrasts with the section where the attached Schedule [A] is incorporated into the SLCMA. The removed sentences create an inconsistency, because the document now references Schedule A being incorporated into the SLCMA, yet there is no prior definition for this Schedule in the current agreement, nor a reference to the overarching SLCMA.

perturbation.original_text: The attached Schedule [A] is hereby incorporated into the SLCMA describing the Offer Placement System Software for use by Bank of America.
perturbation.changed_text: The attached Schedule [A] outlines potential software collaboration areas.
perturbation.explanation: The original statement explicitly ties Schedule [A] to the SLCMA and a specific software system (Offer Placement System Software). The revised statement removes the link to the SLCMA and only vaguely refers to 'potential software collaboration areas'. This change creates uncertainty regarding the enforceability and scope of Schedule [A]. By removing the purpose of the attachment, it is up to interpretation.
